question: Assalamualaikum mufti sahib. Could you kindly tell me any dua or namaz that increases a personâ€™s RIZQ i.e. leads a person to more money, property, fame, etc.Thank you very much
answer:
QUESTION
ANSWER


Share:
The greatest factor which will increase or rather incur barakat and
blessings in ones sustenance is total obedience to Allah Ta'ala and His
Rasul (Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam).

As mentioned in a Hadith, disobedience and sin deprives and diminishes the
sustenance of a person. (Nasai, ibn Majah, Ahmed in his Musnad and Haakim in
his Mustadrak). Five times daily salaat is also a means through which Allah
Ta'ala causes blessings and increase in ones earnings. In the Ahaadith,
there are numerous deeds of piety mentioned which increase the sustenance of
a person e.g. upholding family ties and spending in the path of Allah. Nabi
(Sallallaahu Alayhi Wasallam) used to make the following Du'aa: Allahummak
fina bi halaalika an haraamika wa agnina bifadlika amman siwaak.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
